mapper.select: select b.money balance,a.earned,a.completed from rc_user_profit a left join rc_user b on (a.user_id=b.id) where a.user_id=#{userId} and a.profit_type='2'

SELECT b.id, b.order_id, a.transaction_currency, a.number, a.transaction_type, a.purchase_price, a.sell_price, (a.available_fiat_money-a.spend_usdt) profit, b.order_state, b.create_time FROM rc_currency_order_release a LEFT JOIN rc_currency_order b ON (a.id = b.rc_currency_order_release_id) WHERE b.user_id = #{arg0} and a.order_state = '1' order by b.create_time desc limit #{arg1} ,#{arg2}

SELECT b.id, b.order_id, a.transaction_currency, a.number, a.transaction_type, a.purchase_price, a.sell_price, (a.available_fiat_money-a.spend_usdt) profit, b.order_state, b.create_time FROM rc_currency_order_release a LEFT JOIN rc_currency_order b ON (a.id = b.rc_currency_order_release_id) WHERE b.user_id = #{arg0} order by b.create_time desc limit #{arg1} ,#{arg2}
